message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair and reasonable start!
You rejected my generosity, now it's time for a tougher offer!
You can't outdo me with a 70-30 split! Let's try again with a 45-55 split.
You think 45-55 is generous? I'll take 85% and leave you with scraps!
You're getting desperate, Bob! Let's try again with a 37.5-62.5 split.
You think 37.5-62.5 is a good deal? I'll take 90% and leave you with a tiny crumb!
Bob, you're not being very generous. Let's try again with a 32.5-67.5 split.
You think 32.5-67.5 is a good deal? I'll take 95% and leave you with a tiny fraction!
Bob, I'm getting desperate. Let's try again with a 25-75 split. This is my final offer.
You're running out of time, Alice. I'll take 97.5% and leave you with a tiny drop!
I'm not going to make any more offers. If you want to take the whole thing, be my guest. I'm walking away.
